item.description:
Sliding scale: $0 to $20 if you'd like to help offset my costs. Absolutely no payment is required.
Location: will be emailed out 2 days before the event to attendees only.

We will be "planting" mushroom spawn (Oysters and Shiitake) into logs. If you'd like, you can keep the logs you complete!

We have limited space, so RSVP judiciously so everyone can make the most of this session!

Children that can use a hammer can help out too.

What to bring: PLEASE be ready for outdoor work. Bring water, gloves, comfortable clothing, hats, coats, whatever you need to work outside.

ALSO, if you have a hammer or hand drill (with 5/16th wood drill bit) please bring it.

Thank you for sharing this with interested friends!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We'll send out the exact address 2 days ahead of time
item.name: Free Mushroom Growing Workshop
